name: Cribbage Deluxe
description:
Cribbage is a card game where two players try to score points by forming combinations of cards. The first person to reach 121 points wins! Easy to use controls and detailed instructions make this game fun for all experience levels and ages.

Check out the achievements screen where you can earn prizes for beating fun challenges. Track your statistics and see how your total points stack up against players from around the world on the global leaderboards.

Every game you play earns you Cribbage Coins which you can use to unlock custom cards, backgrounds, and peg boards. You can also choose your own player name and avatar. You will not be able to put down this fun and engaging card classic!

Features:
• Easy to use controls and detailed instructions
• Customize your themes and player profile
• Keep track of in-game statistics
• Fun achievements earn you prizes
• Global leaderboards
